LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.label: joku armomurhattiin
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.label: joku teloitettiin
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.description: Vanki tai vieras tapettiin kylmäverisesti. Tämä yhdyskunta vaikuttaa päivä päivältä pahantahtoisemmalta.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.label: elin kerättiin ja henkilö tapettiin
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.description: Vanki tai vieras kuoli koska yhdyskunta otti häneltä ruumiinosia. Se on kamalaa.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.3.label: someone organ-harvested
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.3.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.label: yhdyskuntalainen armomurhattiin
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.label: yhdyskuntalainen teloitettiin
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.descriptio: Yhdyskuntalainen tapettiin kylmäverisesti. Tämä yhdyskunta vaikuttaa päivä päivältä pahantahtoisemmalta.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.label: yhdyskuntalaisen elin kerättiin ja hänet tapettiin
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.descriptio: Yhdyskuntalainen kuoli koska yhdyskunta otti häneltä ruumiinosia. Se on kamalaa.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.3.label: colonist organ-harvested
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.3.descriptio: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.label: innocent prisoner died
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.descri: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.0.description: One of our people died. We should be able to take care of our people.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.label: bonded animal died
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.description: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my friend died
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.descrip: Such a wonderful person. The universe gets darker every day.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my rival died
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.descript: Serves them right. Things are looking up.
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.label: my son died
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.description: My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.label: my daughter died
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.description: My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.label: my husband died
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.description: My husband is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.label: my wife died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.description: My wife is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.label: my fiance died
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.description: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.label: my fiancée died
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.description: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.description: My lover died. I am so alone.
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.label: my brother died
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.description: My brother died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.0.label: my sister died
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.0.description: My sister died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.0.label: my grandchild died
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.0.description: My grandchild died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.label: my father died
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.description: My father died. He's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.label: my mother died
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.description: My mother died. She's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.label: my niece died
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.description: My niece died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.label: my nephew died
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.description: My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.label: my half-sibling died
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.description: My half-sibling died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyAuntDied.stages.0.label: my aunt died
LanguageData.MyUncleDied.stages.0.label: my uncle died
LanguageData.MyGrandparentDied.stages.0.label: my grandparent died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.0.label: my cousin died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.0.description: My cousin died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyKinDied.stages.0.label: my kin died
